Package estgconstroi

Interface ConstructionSiteManager

public interface ConstructionSiteManager

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG) | Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI) e Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP) - 2021/2022

The ConstructionSiteManager interface provides the methods for an ConstructionSite system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(ConstructionSite constructionSite)
    Adds a constructionSite to the construction site manager.

    getConstructionSitesWithPermitExpired()
    Returns the contruction sites with expired construction permit
    Equipment[]
    getEquipmentsInUse()
    Returns the equipments that are associated to a contruction sites that is currently working
    Equipment[]
    getIddleEquipments()
    Returns the equipments that are not associated to any contruction sites that is currently working
    Team[]
    getIddleTeams()
    Returns the teams that are not associated to any contruction sites that is currently working
    Team[]
    getWorkingTeams()
    Returns the teams that are associated to a contruction site that is currently working
    boolean

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(ConstructionSite constructionSite) throws ConstructionSiteManagerException
      Adds a constructionSite to the construction site manager.
      Parameters:
      constructionSite - construction site to be added.
      Throws:
      ConstructionSiteManagerException - if the contructionsite is null invalid or already exists

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Verifies if the construction sites state is valid. To be valid the following conditions must be met:
      • An equipment cannot belong to more than one contruction site/team at the same time (considering the dates in which each contruction sites is operating
      • An team cannot belong to more than one contruction site at the same time (considering the dates in which each contruction sites is operational
      • An employee cannot belong to more than one team at the same time (considering the dates in which each contruction sites is operating
      Returns:
      true if the construction site is valid, false otherwise.
